cumulative¶

Specifies whether the data plotted with @nplot and exported with @nexport should be cumulative.

Syntax¶

cumulative = on
cumulative = off

Default¶

off

Description¶

cumulative = on will make the postprocessing commands use cumulative values.

cumulative = off will not make the postprocessing commands use cumulative values.
